tip: All of the commands are in the Command Palette with the associated key binding (if it exists). If you forget a keyboard shortcut, use the Command Palette to help you out.
Download the keyboard shortcut reference sheet for your platform
Repeat the Quick Open keyboard shortcut to cycle quickly between recently opened files. (Keyboard Shortcut: ⌘P)
Keyboard Shortcut: ⇧⌘M Quickly jump to errors and warnings in the project. Cycle through errors with F8 or ⇧F8
